long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find companies offering H1B sponsorship, E-Verify, and PERM support across major job platforms, with advanced filters and automated job tracking features.

F1 Hire works with all 5 major platforms: LinkedIn, Indeed, HandShake, Glassdoor, and Google Jobs. The extension helps you filter H1B friendly and E-Verify employers, analyze sponsorship availability, and set strategic search parameters to accelerate your job hunt.

Backed by official data from USCIS, covering 2015 to the present, F1Hire provides you with the most reliable H1B sponsorship information available.

★★★ Key Features ★★★

The extension will:
Provide H1B, E-Verify, PERM (Greencard) detailed history data of companies
Reveal the sponsorship friendliness of any job position
Publish daily H1B job lists. 
Accelerate your job search by 10x with patented Search Strategy technology.
Automatically saves job postings you view
Highlight essential keywords directly from the job description
Compare and tailor your resume to job descriptions side-by-side on the same screen.
AI assistant resume builder to optimize applications for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)

Leveraging the SRIM methodology—Search, Research, Improve, and Manage - F1 Hire streamlines the job search process for job seekers, helping them advance their careers globally. 
Search - Accelerate Your Job Hunt
The most powerful search and screener ever built for international students with the H1B  job list updated daily. Get detailed insights into a company’s H1B, E-Verify, and Green Card sponsorship history, and assess the sponsorship friendliness of any job.
2. Research: Use Comprehensive Data to Target
Gain access to company H1B sponsorship histories, E-Verify records, successful alumni career cases, and data on relevant job titles and salaries. This information allows you to target employers and roles that align with your visa requirements and career goals.
3. Improve - Create ATS-Friendly Resumes for Success
Enhance your resume with F1 Hire's resume builder, keyword insights, and AI tools to pass ATS screenings and tailor applications for specific roles.
4. Manage - Stay Organized for the Long Job Search
Efficiently manage a lengthy job search process with F1 Hire’s Job Board to track applications, generate follow-up communications, and stay on top of opportunities.


 ★★ FAQ ★★
Is it free?
a. Our H1B, E-Verify, and PERM information is completely free for all users. 
b. We are striving to offer the most generous Referral Program possible. You have two options to receive our Premium Plan for FREE:

1. Refer your friends
Share the benefits of F1 Hire with your network, and for every person who signs up using your referral link, you'll receive 14 days of F1 Hire Premium Plan (valued at $9.98/month). And the best part? There's no limit to how many referrals you can make! It’s UNLIMITED!

2. Recommend us to your school
We welcome you to recommend us to your school’s career center to gain access to our Institution Plan. Your recommendation might greatly benefit all international students at your school.
If you choose to contact your school, please send us a record of your recommendation at info@f1hire.com. As a token of our appreciation, we would offer you 14 days of F1 Hire Premium Plan (valued at $9.98/month) regardless of whether the school responds or not.

Is this only for F-1 students?

Yes and no. We designed the tool based on our experience of being F-1 international students, but it’s not exclusively for F-1 students. H-4, H1B transfer, H1B layoffs, and any immigrant visa job seeker will benefit from using the tool. We understand the challenges of finding a job with limited time and opportunities, as well as the extra research required for visa information, and E-Verify information. Our goal is to enhance the transparency of visa sponsorship and present all the necessary information in front of you.


How is this different from Ultimate H1B Sponsor Checker?

We greatly appreciate what Ultimate H1B Sponsor Checker has accomplished in providing visa information to job seekers. However, we offer more comprehensive H1B information and E-Verify information and provide additional functionalities to enhance your job search.


How can I get an institutional plan?

Your school needs to be enrolled in our institutional plan so that you can access an institutional plan. We encourage you to reach out to your career center to inquire about the possibility of joining.
